scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as a prophet, is depicted seated and gesturing with his right hand. He wears a vibrant blue robe adorned with gold trim and holds a scroll inscribed with Hebrew lettering. To his left, a ram with a halo rests, symbolizing a sacrificial animal or a biblical figure. The background features a richly patterned tapestry in black, red, and gold, with diamond-shaped motifs and blue accents. The scene is set on a green ground, with a stone structure visible to the right, suggesting a raised platform or altar.
